definition: to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: The new Air Force chiefs were talking about how awesome drones were.
sentences.chinese: 空军的新首长正在谈论无人驾驶飞机是多么厉害。

sentences.english: Do the five or fifty and find out what it's talking about.
sentences.chinese: 请做那5或50的练习，并找出它所谈论的事物。

sentences.english: When Bush 41 talked about the economy, that was the beginning of the downward spiral.
sentences.chinese: 老布什谈论经济的时候，是经济衰退的开始。

sentences.english: They tell you about their daughter and what she is doing.
sentences.chinese: 他们跟你谈论自己的女儿，告诉你她现在从事的工作。

sentences.english: And I'm worried about e-mail! Talk about pricking my pomposity.
sentences.chinese: 用电子邮件不行吗，谈论一下对我自大的打击。

sentences.english: Never talk about feeling if they aren't there.
sentences.chinese: 如果你没有真情实意，就不要谈论什么感情。

sentences.english: On the trail the women talked excitedly about the future.
sentences.chinese: 走在崎岖的小道上，两个女人眉飞色舞地谈论着未来。

sentences.english: Maybe you can tell your friends are very excitedly discussing an event.
sentences.chinese: 你可能发现你的朋友们饶有兴致地谈论一个活动。

sentences.english: I wish she stop blabbering her boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我希望她停止碟碟不休地谈论她男朋友。

sentences.english: They are talking about an Amerian movie.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在谈论一部美国电影。

sentences.english: Such things are never talked about in businese circles.
sentences.chinese: 商业界的人士从来不谈论这种事。

sentences.english: In essence, the concept I’m talking about is flying without a net.
sentences.chinese: 实质上，我谈论的是自由飞行的概念。

sentences.english: I mean, you're already talking about how that's not applicable.
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是说，您已经谈论了这是如何不可适用的。

sentences.english: Zhou Lan and Bruce are talking about listening to English.
sentences.chinese: 周兰和布鲁斯正在谈论关于英语听力方面的事情。

sentences.english: You wanna talk about being outcoached, just watch this game.
sentences.chinese: 你想谈论没有执教能力，就看看这场比赛吧。

sentences.english: Hear Devan and Jeff talk about their dreams.
sentences.chinese: 听听德凡和杰夫如何谈论他们的梦。

definition: to comment/to talk about/to discuss/discussion/CL:個|个[ge4]
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to bring to sb's attention
variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
to refuse to say anything about (idiom)/to remain tight-lipped/to avoid mentioning
